## Software development

- **fastDR — Fast Doubly Robust Estimation**  
  Implements doubly robust treatment effect estimation using boosted propensity scores and weighted GLMs.  
  Development: https://github.com/gregridgeway/fastDR

- **gbm — Generalized Boosted Regression Models**  
  Gradient boosting and related models (C++ engine, R frontend).  
  Development: https://github.com/gbm-developers/gbm
